column2: perf_metrics_base_model_LO_LS <- bind_rows(perf_metrics_base_model_L_O_SnP, perf_metrics_base_model_LS_SnP, perf_metrics_base_model_L_O_FTSE, perf_metrics_base_model_LS_FTSE, perf_metrics_base_model_L_O_CAC, perf_metrics_base_model_LS_CAC)
